comments.body: This trait help us implement all specialized getters with a `genericGetter`, it's now used in `GenericArrayData` and `InternalRow`, and I think it's useful if we add new `SpecializedGetters` implement in the future.
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,61 @@

+package org.apache.spark.sql.catalyst.expressions
+
+import org.apache.spark.sql.catalyst.InternalRow
+import org.apache.spark.sql.types.{DataType, MapData, ArrayData, Decimal}
+import org.apache.spark.unsafe.types.{CalendarInterval, UTF8String}
+
+trait GenericSpecializedGetters extends SpecializedGetters {
